\\n

STINGING<\\/p>\\n<\\/div>\\n

\\n

It is a stinging species that could produce important effects on humans. It is recommended to avoid all contact with this jellyfish.

\\n

Characteristics<\\/strong>
It is the largest jellyfish on the Catalan coast. The umbrela is bell-shaped, with a diameter that can reach up to 40 cm and weigh up to 10 kilograms. This species presents eight oral arms, fused and unbranched of the same color as the umbrela and lacks marginal tentacles. Sometimes, other organisms such as juvenile fish and small crabs use this species as a refuge.<\\/p>\\n<\\/div>\\n

\\n

Frequency<\\/strong>
Small jellyfish are released in spring and keep on growing until they reach the adult phase. The larger adults are more evident on our shores in summer and fall.<\\/p>\\n<\\/div>\\n

Esta especie presenta ocho brazos orales gruesos, fusionados y sin ramificaciones, del mismo color de la umbrela y carece de tentáculos marginales.
